mapper.insert: insert into member (name, userid, pwd, number, email, phone, image, postcode, address1, address2) values (#{name}, #{userid}, #{pwd}, #{number}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{image}, #{postcode}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.select: select * from member_attendance where midx = #{midx} and date = #{date}
mapper.update: update member_attendance set endtime = now() where midx = #{midx} and date = #{date} and endtime is null
mapper.select: select midx, starttime, date_format(endtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS endtime from member_attendance where midx = #{midx} and date = #{date} and endtime is not null
select * from member where userid = #{userid} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.update: update member set pwd = #{pwd}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, postcode = #{postcode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, image = #{image} where midx = #{midx}
